text: Without Love is a 1945 American romantic comedy movie directed by Harold S. Bacquet and was based on the 1942 play of the same name by Philip Barry. It stars Spencer Tracy, Katharine Hepburn, Lucille Ball, Keenan Wynn, Carl Esmond, Patricia Morison and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1945 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies
title: Without Love
